actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farmers Home Administration Act of 1961, to amend the definition of "rural area" to permit towns of 25,000 or less inhabitants to be considered rural areas for purposes of the act.

summary.text: Revises the Consolidated Farmers Home Administration Act of 1961 by redefining "rural area" to permit towns of twenty-five thousand or less inhabitants to be considered rural areas for purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farmers Home Administration Act of 1961, to amend the definition of "rural area" to permit towns of 25,000 or less inhabitants to be considered rural areas for purposes of the act.
